internships.aboutCompany: Persistent Systems is a global services company that delivers digital business acceleration, enterprise modernization, and digital product engineering solutions.
internships.work: During my internship at Persistent Systems, I was responsible for developing and improving several web applications as part of a larger team. I collaborated closely with senior engineers to understand the requirements, develop solutions, and contribute to both frontend and backend aspects of the application.
internships.tech: I worked primarily with Angular for the frontend, developing dynamic components for user interactions. On the backend, I used Node.js and Express to build RESTful APIs and integrated MongoDB for efficient data management.

internships.aboutCompany: Escorts Limited is an Indian multinational company that operates in the sectors of agri-machinery, construction, material handling, and railway equipment.
internships.work: At Escorts, I contributed to their tractor trajectory project by developing a Python UI using PyQt5, which provided visual feedback for various tractor control systems.
internships.tech: The internship honed my skills in Python, specifically using PyQt5 for UI development.
